definitions.definition: A mammal, Canis familiaris or Canis lupus familiaris, that has been domesticated for thousands of years, of highly variable appearance due to human breeding.
definitions.example: The dog barked all night long.

definitions.definition: Any member of the Family Canidae, including domestic dogs, wolves, coyotes, jackals, foxes, and their relatives (extant and extinct); canid.
A male dog, wolf or fox, as opposed to a bitch or vixen.
A dull, unattractive girl or woman.
A man (derived from definition 2).
A coward.
definitions.example: Come back and fight, you dogs!

definitions.definition: Someone who is morally reprehensible.
A sexually aggressive man (cf. horny).
Any of various mechanical devices for holding, gripping, or fastening something, particularly with a tooth-like projection.
A click or pallet adapted to engage the teeth of a ratchet-wheel, to restrain the back action; a click or pawl. (See also: ratchet, windlass)
A metal support for logs in a fireplace.
definitions.example: The dogs were too hot to touch.

definitions.definition: The eighteenth Lenormand card.
A hot dog.
Underdog.
(almost always in the plural) Foot.
(from "dog and bone") Phone or mobile phone.
One of the cones used to divide up a racetrack when training horses.
A flop; a film that performs poorly at the box office.
To pursue with the intent to catch.
To follow in an annoying or harassing way.
definitions.example: The woman cursed him so that trouble would dog his every step.

definitions.definition: To fasten a hatch securely.
definitions.example: It is very important to dog down these hatches...

definitions.definition: To watch, or participate, in sexual activity in a public place.
definitions.example: I admit that I like to dog at my local country park.

definitions.definition: To intentionally restrict one's productivity as employee; to work at the slowest rate that goes unpunished.
definitions.example: A surprise inspection of the night shift found that some workers were dogging it.

definitions.definition: To criticize.
To divide (a watch) with a comrade.
Meat from a dog eaten as food.
definitions.example: We visited South Korea this time around, where we ate dog meat for the first time.

definitions.definition: Meat prepared to be given to a dog as food.
An insult intended to assert hyperbolically that another person has value only as a corpse to be fed to a dog.
definitions.example: Did you just step on my blue suede shoes? You're dog meat now!

definitions.definition: Feet, from rhyming slang dog's meat.
definitions.example: My dogs are tired. Let's get a taxi.

definitions.definition: (usually with the) A greyhound racing event; the sport of greyhound racing.
definitions.example: I lost money at the dogs last night.

definitions.definition: Fasteners securing a watertight hatch.
